title: IM SURE I GOT BANNED FROM LEAVEBUSTER WHILE I WAS IN FULL GAME
body: after I finished my full game of league last night I logged out woke up in the morning to have a game then as I signed in it says my account  has been permanently suspended I was confused of what happened but all I know is I haven't been leaving games or trash talking to others I need help To get my account back please :(

replies.body:
It's possible that you got the punishment in place of someone else. Are you the only person who uses your account?

[Submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about it. The red will guide you through the rest.
